title: Brown Sales INC
summary: WordPress was a requirement for this site, so I learned WordPress and made Brown Sales a site for their multi-family flooring business

title: Brown Sales Flooring
summary: I created this site for Brown Sales as a portal to all of their other sites

title: Brightstar Bucks
summary: Managers can create goals for employees and upon completion they recieve credits to purchase company merch.

title: HIKER
summary: When users go hiking they can check in and if they dont check out in time their emergency contacts are notified by text.

title: No Mans Sky Trivia
summary: A trivia game using on click events, timers and more to dynamically change the webpage.

title: League of Clicks
summary: This application showcases what I learned in React the first week I learned it.

title: Map-up
summary: This was the first project I did with a group in the bootcamp I attended.

title: Crystal Collector
summary: A simple Javascript/JQuery game using click events and random numbers.

title: myDeck
summary: Users can create and manage Magic: The Gathering decks.
